text: Pietro Citati (20 February 1930 â€“ 28 July 2022) was an Italian writer and literary critic. He was born in Florence, Italy. He wrote the biographies of Goethe, Alexander the Great, Kafka and Marcel Proust. He also worked for Corriere della Sera and was the literary critic for la Repubblica. Citati died in Roccamare, Italy on 28 July 2022 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Writers from Florence Category:Italian critics Category:Literary critics
title: Pietro Citati
